channel.title: podcast on The Work Item
channel.description: Recent content in podcast on The Work Item

item.title: S01E06 - Interview with Matt Swanson
item.description:
Today, we had the honor of having an in-depth conversation with Matt Swanson, a software engineer at SEP, on engineering best practices, design systems, and managing complexity.
You can also listen to the audio directly: You can find Matt on the following sites: Twitter GitHub Blog And of course, we couldn’t wrap up this post without giving a shout-out to Matt’s project - Boring Rails.

item.title: S01E05 - Interview with Jin Yang
item.description:
A virtual fireside chat with Jin Yang, VP of design at CapitalOne. We discuss leadership, building great teams, and wrap up the show with food place recommendations.
You can also listen to the audio directly: You can find Jin on social media: Twitter Check this episode out on Apple Podcasts, Google Play Podcasts and Spotify.

item.title: S01E04 - Interview with Clint Rutkas
item.description:
In this episode, Courtny Cotten and Den Delimarsky chat with Clint Rutkas about PowerToys - a fantastic set of utilities for Windows power users.
You can also listen to the audio directly: You can find Clint on the following Internet locations: Twitter GitHub Check this episode out on Apple Podcasts, Google Play Podcasts and Spotify.

item.title: S01E03 - Interview with April Speight
item.description:
In this episode, Courtny Cotten and Den Delimarsky chat with April Speight, Senior Developer Advocate at Microsoft, about social media, writing Python books for kids and more.
You can also listen to the audio directly: You can find April on the following Internet locations: Twitter Twitch YouTube Her blog GitHub Check this episode out on Apple Podcasts, Google Play Podcasts and Spotify.

item.title: S01E02 - Career Starts
item.description:
What is it like to start as a designer or a product manager? In this episode, Courtny and Den talk about their own journey in the tech industry, from the very early days!
You can also listen to the audio directly: Check this episode out on Apple Podcasts and Spotify.

item.title: S01E01 - Remote Work
item.description:
Have you ever wondered what it’s like to work away from a tall office building in a large metropolis? Courtny and Den dive into this topic and more!
You can also listen to the audio directly: Check this episode out on Apple Podcasts and Spotify.
